mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dutchauction_register( member_id, company_no, company_name, accommodation_no, accommodation_name, guestroom_no, guestroom_name, dutchauction_register_date, dutchauction_startprice, maximum_discount_price, dutchauction_sale_unit, dutchauction_sale_interval, dutchauction_close_date, dutchauction_checkin_date, dutchauction_checkout_date) VALUES( #{memberId}, #{companyNo}, #{companyName}, #{accommodationNo}, #{accommodationName}, #{guestroomNo}, #{guestroomName}, now(), #{dutchauctionStartprice}, #{maximumDiscountPrice}, #{dutchauctionSaleUnit}, #{dutchauctionSaleInterval}, #{dutchauctionCloseDate}, #{dutchauctionCheckinDate}, #{dutchauctionCheckoutDate})
mapper.select: SELECT d.accommodation_name, d.guestroom_name, d.dutchauction_startprice, d.dutchauction_sale_unit, d.dutchauction_sale_interval, d.dutchauction_update_price, d.dutchauction_checkin_date, d.dutchauction_checkout_date, d.dutchauction_register_date, i.image_file_stored_name, i.image_file_ext, a.accommodation_address FROM dutchauction_register as d INNER JOIN guestroom as g on d.guestroom_no = g.guestroom_no INNER JOIN image_file as i on g.image_file_no = i.image_file_no INNER JOIN accommodation as a on d.accommodation_no = a.accommodation_no WHERE d.auction_state_category_no = 1 ORDER BY d.dutchauction_register_date ASC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT d.accommodation_name, d.guestroom_name, d.dutchauction_startprice, d.auction_state_category_name, d.dutchauction_sale_unit, d.dutchauction_sale_interval, d.dutchauction_update_price, d.dutchauction_checkin_date, d.dutchauction_checkout_date, d.dutchauction_register_date, i.image_file_stored_name, i.image_file_ext, ds.member_id, ds.dutchauction_successfulbid_date FROM dutchauction_register as d INNER JOIN guestroom as g on d.guestroom_no = g.guestroom_no INNER JOIN image_file as i on g.image_file_no = i.image_file_no LEFT OUTER JOIN dutchauction_successfulbid as ds on ds.dutchauction_register_no = d.dutchauction_no WHERE NOT(d.auction_state_category_no = 1) ORDER BY d.dutchauction_register_date ASC
SELECT count(*) FROM dutchauction_register WHERE auction_state_category_no = 1
SELECT count(*) FROM dutchauction_register WHERE NOT(auction_state_category_no = 1)
